title-part.text: DOMESTIC- OR SPACE-HEATING SYSTEMS, e.g. CENTRAL HEATING SYSTEMS

reference.text: preventing corrosion C23F; water supply in general E03; using steam or condensate extracted or exhausted from steam engine plants for heating purposes F01K17/02; steam traps F16T; domestic stoves or ranges F24B, C; water or air heaters having heat generating means F24H; combined heating and refrigeration systems F25B; heat exchange apparatus or elements F28; removing furring F28G

note.note-paragraph:
In this subclass, the following expression is used with the meaning indicated:
- "Central heating system" means a system in which heat is
generated or stored at central sources and is distributed
by means of a transfer fluid to the spaces or areas to be
heated.

reference.text: F24D10/00, F24D11/00 take precedence
